Hit Points: 132 Initiative: 4 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+9 1d4+3); Greatclub (+9 1d8+3); Spear (+9 1d8+3 R20/60); Unarmed (+9 1d10+3)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: -1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: -1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +0 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises damage die to 1d10
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +4 Armor Class in no armor
Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self
Debilitating Barrage: Spend 3 Ki Points after triple hit for foe Disadv next attack, vulnerability to chosen damage type for 1 min (Con neg)
Deflect Missiles: May use Reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+19 HP; reducing to 0 HP allows spending 1 Ki Point for immediate attack
Extort Truth: Spend 2 Ki Points after dbl hit to prevent foe lying (Cha neg) for 1 min
Extract Aspects: Spend 1 Ki Point after dbl hit to gain info about foe (Con neg)
Flurry Of Blows: May spend 1 Ki Point to gain 2 bonus unarmed strikes
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Martial Arts: When unarmored, may make a bonus unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mind Of Mercury: Spend 1 Ki Points for 1 extra reactions
Patient Defense: May spend 1 Ki Point for a bonus Dodge
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 Ki Points available after initiative
Preternatural Counter: Use Reaction for OA after foe miss
Step Of The Wind: May spend 1 Ki Point to gain a bonus Disengage or Dash and dbl jump
Stunning Strike: After a successful attack, may spend 1 Ki Point to stun foe (DC 18 Constitution neg) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 9; Constitution: 9; Dexterity: 5; Intelligence: 7; Strength: 9; Wisdom: 10
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Diamond Soul: May spend 1 Ki Point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Mind Of Mercury: Spend 1 Ki Point for Adv on Investigation
Purity Of Body: Immune to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: May end self charm and fright at will
Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 2; K1: 1 Attack: K: 9; Monk: 10 Spell DC: K: 17; Monk: 18
Spells:
Arms Of Hadar (K1 Conj): 10' radius inflicts 2d6 HP necrotic and no Reaction for 1 rd (Strength half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Astral Projection (Monk9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Blade Ward (K0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 4 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 K0 spells/May cast chosen K1 spell 1/long rest
Empty Body: May spend 4 Ki Points to gain 1 min invisibility w/resistance to all damage other than force/May spend 8 Ki Points to cast self Astral Projection
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
